sentence.Network_en: Accordingly Collins and I spent several economical and instructive weeks together in Ravenna.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此,科林斯同我在腊万纳过了几周节俭的,有益的生活.

sentence.Network_en: Did your father actually send you a postcard from Ravenna?
sentence.Network_cn: 您父亲确实从拉文纳给您寄过明信片 吗 ?
